div.span: Please be advised that MLSD Schools will be closed from Monday, April 6th, through Friday, May 1st. Superintendent Rau will notify staff, students, and parents if the return date changes.

span.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff

div.span: We will have an in-person enrollment later on when things open back up. For now, I have taped envelopes with forms to the front elementary doors where they can turn them back in that way or e-mail them to me or Tina.

h3.a: Important Survey Regarding Meals During School Closure

div.span: If your child would like to receive meals during the unfortunate school closure, we ask that parents and guardians please complete a Google Form survey in efforts to obtain somewhat of an accurate count of meals. The link is below.

b.span: Link: Here is the link for the Google Form survey.

span.strong: Just a reminder that Manchester High School Prom Tickets will remain at $55.00 until further notice.
Important information regarding Senior Yearbook Pages & Wills and Testaments

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Senior Ads are currently on sale for the 2020 yearbook. If you are interested in purchasing a page in the yearbook for your senior, the price is $100 for a Full page and $50 for a Half page. For a full page, you can put around 10 pictures and your message and about 5 pictures for a half page. Please email the photos you would like on your senior page to

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Payments should be mailed in as check or money order and should be made out to Manchester High School with “Senior Yearbook Page” in the memo line. Please mail your payment to:

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We are collecting pictures for the senior slide show at this time. Each senior can send in 5 pictures for the slide show.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Senior quotes will also be in the yearbook this year. You may email pictures (it doesn't have to be a baby picture) to

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: as well as the quote you would like to go beside your picture.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Senior Last Will and Testament is due ASAP. Wills must be typed using 50 words or less and can be emailed to

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Yearbooks are also on sale and can be purchased online from our high school website. Yearbooks with a name stamp are $40.00 and without a name stamp $35.00.
